quote: Cole sat back up, slowly, and I opened my eyes. His expression, as ever, was blank, the face he wore when something mattered. He said, ""That's how I would kiss you, if I loved you.
quote_letters: COLE SAT BACK UP SLOWLY AND I OPENED MY EYES HIS EXPRESSION AS EVER WAS BLANK THE FACE HE WORE WHEN SOMETHING MATTERED HE SAID THATS HOW I WOULD KISS YOU IF I LOVED YOU
